content: this colourful baby blanket is fun to make and is a great way to practice new crochet stitches rather than writing a detailed row-by-row pattern i ve described the stitches i ve used you can follow my example or mix and match stitches to suit your own design finished size 80cm width x 102cm height i ve used 12 colours in total but you can make this with around 6 5 100g balls equivalent total yarn weight 640g premier anti pilling worsted 5mm hook i ve used a fold over border to encase wobbly edges and give a neat finish similar to a quilt binding
